          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction of water waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung der Wasserwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction des vagues de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction de ondas da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione delle onde dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση των κυμάτων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de las ondas del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the refraction of water waves as these hit a sloping beach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave refraction</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt der Brechung der 
Wasserwellen als dieser Hit ein schräger Strand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à la réfraction des 
vagues de l'eau en tant que ces le coup une plage en pente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra ao refraction de ondas da
água como este a batida uma praia inclinando-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra alla rifrazione delle 
onde dell'acqua come questa il colpo una spiaggia inclinata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει στη διάθλαση των κυμάτων 
ύδατος όπως αυτό το χτύπημα κεκλιμένη παραλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a refracción de las 
ondas del agua como esta golpe una playa que se inclina.</string>
          </description>
